hackathon-judges.judge-role: Founder of Future of Money & Tech Summit

hackathon-eligibility: You are welcome to join us if you:
hackathon-requirements:
Hackers will have the opportunity to build towards specific hack challenges, ideate their own or join forces with a team with a project idea.
Only projects that were started and created starting Saturday, October 31 will be elligible for 1st place prize.
hackathon-rules:
This will be explained during the hackahton!
Note: Only projects that were started and created starting Saturday, October 31 will be elligible for 1st place prize.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First Place Prize: $1,000 or 4 BTCs + 4 free admissions to a Blockchain University class for presenting team*
Second Place Prize: $750 or 3 BTCs + 3 free admissions to a Blockchain University class for presenting team*
Third Place Prize: $250 or 1 BTC + 1 free admissions to a Blockchain University class*
